text: Guillermo Arturo Ceroni Fuentes (born 30 July 1946) is a Chilean politician who served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies, representing District 40 of the Maule Region. He served as Provisional President of the Chamber of Deputies following the death of Juan Bustos. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile Category:People from Linares Province Category:University of Chile alumni Category:Party for Democracy (Chile) politicians
title: Guillermo Ceroni
